description: An ultra-technical hiking shoe that helps you achieve all your outdoor goals. Designed to adapt to all your desires, the Outpulse Gore-Tex is as versatile as it is efficient. Combining grip and protection, this model has a sole that offers exceptional energy return and cushioning thanks to our new Fuze Foam. Reinvent your outdoor adventures.
name: Salomon Outpulse GTX - Mens

specs.value: Comprised of one of our softest EVA compound and engineered using less artificial polymers, Fuze Surge delivers a more earth-conscious, smooth yet dynamic stride
Inspired by Salomon's ski heritage, this curved midsole geometry helps you feel like you are floating over the ground
Engineered into the midsole, Energy Blade is a lightweight TPU plate works in cohesion with the soft and springy midsole to filter the ground and deliver a smooth, dynamic stride
Their All Terrain Contagrip® is built for the widest variety of surfaces. It delivers durability & confidence on wet, dry, hard or loose surfaces
A special treatment is applied to provide extra protection, ensuring that the fabric does not absorb water during light rain and showers
A soft, breathable lining for extreme comfort
Cut to the shape of the inner shoe, this OrthoLite® insole provides superior cushioning, breathability and durability, upgrading the comfort and performance of the footwear
Materials made from recycled products such as PET bottles or material waste
